about_the_game:
Prepare yourself for the ultimate challenge with Not Easy, a hardcore platformer designed to push you to your absolute limits. Navigate through relentless obstacles and gather keys to unlock doors, advancing to the next level. With 10 levels available in the demo, this game will test your skills, patience, and perseverance. Are you ready to prove your mastery?

Features:

  • 10 Intense Levels (Demo): Each level designed to challenge your platforming skills.
  • Relentless Obstacles: Face a variety of obstacles that will push you to your limits.
  • Key Collecting Mechanics: Gather keys to unlock doors and progress to the next level.
  • Hardcore Gameplay: Perfect for players who crave a demanding and rewarding experience.

Are you ready to prove your mastery?

name: Not Easy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (32-bit or 64-bit x86)
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4th Gen or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Get ready for the ultimate challenge with Not Easy, a hardcore platformer that tests your skills and patience. Navigate relentless obstacles, gather keys, and unlock doors across 10 (demo) intense levels. Each level is designed to push your reflexes and determination to the limit.
